name: Enhanced Diplomacy
text: You imbue the subject with divine diplomacy skills. The creature gets a +2 competence bonus on a single Diplomacy or Intimidate check. It must choose to use the bonus before making the roll to which it applies.
duration_zh: 1分钟 或 直至能量发散
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 你将一个主题融入了神圣的交涉技巧。生物在交涉或威吓检定上获得+2表现加值。你必须要在投掷骰子之前，选择是否要将此加值应用其上。
